meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Andy Seff Shasa Dobrow Carol Schlau Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4061.

td.p: Andy Seff, a law student from Baltimore, Maryland
Shasa Dobrow, a musician and graduate student originally from Vancouver, Washington
Carol Schlau, a newspaper copy editor from Buffalo, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,599)

tr.td: VICE PRESIDENTS
PRO BASKETBALL
SCRAMBLED SAYINGS
LEFTOVERS
BIRD PEOPLE
ELVIS HAS LEFT THE BUILDING

Shasa
')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

"Snug as a bug in a rug"

Carol
')

Shasa
Andy

tr.td: Carol
Shasa
Andy
LONDON LITERARY TOUR
PROBING QUESTIONS
'80s ROCK
THE LARGEST IN AREA
(Alex: We'll give you a list.)
BOATS & SHIPS
WHAT'S "D" MATTER?
